name: AUTO WRECKAS
description:
Latest release: -August 17 2022

Description: -It is the year 2049. 51 years after the psychopomp MOBIUS first arrived. HE is fully awakened, organized a monstrous championship of deadly car combat. The people notice that one by one, they began to change and manifest impulsive behavior as they leave their boring office jobs and seek out adventure and thrill.

but as a changing people manifest changing needs and entertainment, Mobius has just the thing to satisfy these restless animals, this gladiatorial show called: AUTO WRECKAS. You must now take the wheel and win to get your free wish, driver.

v1.0.1 OUT NOW! this version of the game has: -1 track -9 cars -8 endings
